ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: (Okay, I would like to explain my actions. I was not really controlling Soundwave. If I had to wait for him to do every little thing it would not get very far.

(Okay, I would like to explain my actions. I was not really 
controlling Soundwave. If I had to wait for him to do every little 
thing it would not get very far. I know better than to say what 
Soundwave looked like, or to control him in a fight. As for the Super-
Powerful thing, I will trim him down a bit. But if TM2 did all that 
awesome stuff to Cheetor, TM3 has to go past that. I hope this cleans 
everything up.")

As Vulois is talking to the Bat Predacon, another insect predacon 
comes flying and starts shooting at Vulois. He moves to the back of 
the wall and says something to the Bat Pred.

"I'll be back. Think about what I said."

Vulois started down the vent with the machine, hoping no Preds 
followed him.
